channel.title: Tips on Jeroen Mols
channel.description: Recent content in Tips on Jeroen Mols

item.title: Using VPN during MDNS server development
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Are you using a VPN on your mobile device? Do you need to disable that to access your development web server over MDNS on your mobile device?

item.title: Using multiple SSH keys for Github and Github enterprise
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Looking to configure multiple SSH keys on the same computer? For instance to use a different SSH key for your public and enterprise Github contributions.

item.title: Verify Github profile link on Mastodon
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Looking to get a fancy verified checkmark on Mastodon for your Github account? This post details how I made this work. Steps # Before I get started, huge thanks to Simon Wilson for inspiring me with the original idea.

item.title: Test React app on mobile without Wi-Fi
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Traveling by train or plane and want to test your react app on your mobile phone? This quick post explains how to access your react development server from your phone without a Wi-Fi connection.

item.title: Modularization - Lessons learned
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Wrapping up this series on modularization I’d like to share some of the things we’ve learned at Philips Hue while going through this process the past year.
